channel.title: [PI] Adding sprites
channel.description:
Ok, so i'm trying to add a summoning interface and I have no clue on how to get the sprites on the interface, like the option shows up to infuse the pouch and if you click it then it will tell you what you need, but there is no sprite. How can I get this - [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mpy0c2.png[/img]
To this - [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2pq9p1j.png[/img]

try that[/quote]I tried it and all it did was make the interface all laggy and it doesn’t show up
